mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sitegrp(sitegrpno, seqno, wname, wdate, title, grpcont, thumbname, thumbsize, viewcnt, likecnt, sitecnt) VALUES(sitegrp_seq.nextval, #{seqno}, #{wname}, sysdate, #{title}, #{grpcont}, #{thumbname}, #{thumbsize}, #{viewcnt}, #{likecnt}, #{sitecnt})
mapper.select: SELECT sitegrpno, seqno, wname, wdate, title, grpcont, thumbname, thumbsize, viewcnt, likecnt, sitecnt FROM sitegrp ORDER BY seqno ASC
